content.webTitle: We're building something exciting: Announcing our new online learning programme

fields.headline: We're building something exciting: Announcing our new online learning programme
fields.bodyText: Our new online learning programme will allow people across the globe to come together and grow their talent. We want to say a huge thank you to everyone who took part in our first test events to help us shape our new online workshops, and ensure we’re building content that can truly inspire and equip you with new skills. It is so exciting to collaborate with you on this new project. We were overwhelmed with the response from participants to our initial masterclasses and have been working hard to put your feedback into action for our next ones. We will have more to share very soon, but in the meantime please browse our course pages and sign up to our newsletter be the first to hear when new workshops are announced. Watch this space… The below events have now passed but new online workshops will be released soon. Information is power: a data visualisation workshop Thursday 16 April, 10am-12.30pm Led by Guardian data visualisation experts Adam Frost and Tobias Sturt, this interactive workshop will enable you to unlock the value of your datasets to create infographics that tell memorable stories with clarity and imagination. All the spaces on 16 April are now taken! But you can sign up to our mailing list to be the first to hear when we announce new classes. Midday mindfulness masterclass Friday 17 April 2020, 12noon-1.30pm Taking breaks from reactive working patterns and social media, and creating space for your own wellbeing, is vital in safeguarding yourself from burnout. Take a nourishing lunch break with Ed Halliwell, leading mindfulness instructor, and learn how to master your worries, rather than be controlled by them. All the spaces on 17 April are now taken! But you can sign up to our mailing list to be the first to hear when we announce new classes. Get inspired: An empowering creative writing masterclass with acclaimed author Laura Dockrill Sunday 19 April 2020, 2pm-4pm If you’ve found yourself with more time than you’re used to, now is the opportunity to exercise your creativity and get started on that project you’ve always wanted to. Learn key writing skills in this inclusive, motivational masterclass with Laura Dockrill. All the spaces on 19 April are now taken! But you can sign up to our mailing list to be the first to hear when we announce new classes. Social media strategy in a crisis: Build and strengthen your brand Tuesday 21 April 2020, 3pm-5.30pm In a time of upheaval and change, organisations – be they large enterprises, SMEs, non-profits or freelancers – are having to rapidly adjust their business models. How can you use social media to facilitate this transition and reach new audiences? Digital marketing expert Tom Szekeres will demonstrate how you can adapt your marketing model to build and maintain brand loyalty – even in the toughest climate. All the spaces on 21 April are now taken! But you can sign up to our mailing list to be the first to hear when we announce new classes. Resilience in a crisis: Tackle your inner critic and boost your motivation Wednesday 22 April 2020, 6.45pm-8.30pm In a crisis, our critical self-talk can multiply, leaving us feeling overwhelmed, flattened and demotivated. In this evening class, leading life coach Fiona Buckland will take you through the practical takeaway techniques for improving your confidence, effectiveness and positive sense of self – no matter the challenges you are confronted with. All the spaces on 22 April are now taken! But you can sign up to our mailing list to be the first to hear when we announce new classes. Creativity for hope: An interactive illustration masterclass with artist Millie Nice Saturday 25 April 2020, 3pm-4.15pm In a time of crisis, it is important we connect with our inner creativity, empathy and resourcefulness. In this empowering and restorative afternoon workshop with artist Millie Nice, you will reconnect with yourself and learn how to find beauty and hope in your surroundings. All the spaces on 25 April are now taken! But you can sign up to our mailing list to be the first to hear when we announce new classes.
